about_the_game:
ENDS is a single-player game set in the Pembridge Estate in London, which faces imminent demolition by the local council. Players take on the role of Rahim, navigating his life alongside friends Sonny and Reece. The narrative explores the challenges and choices of urban life, contrasting the realities of different social classes.

With sandbox and RPG elements, players immerse themselves in a gritty crime drama, experiencing realistic and grounded gameplay elements. It’s a coming-of-age story that delves into the complexities of brotherhood, family, and loyalty.



  • Engage in intense melee and hand-to-hand combat, making use of environmental attacks and grappling for diverse confrontations.
  • Stay connected with an in-game phone containing key information like the map and access to radio stations.
  • Navigate parts of London with bicycles, mopeds and a range of vehicles or take the train for a faster option.

REAL LIFE BRANDS

Explore in-game shops featuring real brands ranging from clothing to food and beverages allowing an immersive experience.

DIVERSE SIDE ACTIVITIES

Enjoy a variety of replayable side missions and meet strangers through random encounters across the city.

DECISIONS CARVE DESTINY

Your decisions serve as the guiding stars driving the storyline. From minor interactions to key events, each choice shapes the direction of the narrative.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Frequent Violence or Gore, Drugs and Drug Use, General Mature Content and Strong Language.

name: ENDS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600X / Intel Core i5-7600K
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Immerse yourself in an authentic gritty experience set on the ruthless streets of London.
